Method Detail

getInstance

public static DefaultAnnotationFactory getInstance()

ofContext

public List<Annotation> ofContext(AnnotatedEntity entity)
Access a list of annotations that are specific to the provided entity class. Note: the annotations contained with in the list should only be used to construct new entities and not to store information. The instances_old instead of the classes are returned to avoid extra object creation.

Specified by:
ofContext in interface AnnotationFactory
Parameters:
entity - instance of the entity you which to get context annotations for
Returns:
List of annotations that can be added to that class which are intended for new instantiation only

Access a list of annotations that are specific to the provided entity class. Note: the annotations contained with in the list should only be used to construct new entities and not to store information. The instances_old instead of the classes are returned to avoid extra object creation.

Specified by:
ofContext in interface AnnotationFactory
Parameters:

Returns:
List of annotations that can be added to that class which are intended for new instantiation only

ofClass

public <A extends Annotation> A ofClass(Class<? extends A> c)
Construct an empty annotation of the given class type. Note there is an overhead off using this method over as the Byte index is first looked up in the AnnotationLoader. The average speed reduction is 1800 % slower (note this is still only about 1/3 second for 100 000 objects).

Specified by:
ofClass in interface AnnotationFactory
Parameters:
c -
Returns:

ofIndex

@Deprecated
public <A extends Annotation> A ofIndex(byte index)
Deprecated. use AnnotationFactory.ofClass(Class)

Construct an empty annotation given it's index. It the index returns a null pointer then an InvalidParameterException is thrown informing of the problematic index. The index is given in the uk.ac.ebi.annotation/AnnotationDescription.properties file which in turn is loaded by {

getMatchingFlags

public Set<Flag> getMatchingFlags(AnnotatedEntity entity)
Access a set of annotation flags that could match this entity. This provides suggestion of matching flag's for this entity using the AbstractFlag.matches(AnnotatedEntity)

Specified by:
getMatchingFlags in interface AnnotationFactory
Parameters:
entity - the entity to collect matching flags for
Returns:
annotations which could be added to the entity (may need user prompt)
See Also:
Flag.matches(uk.ac.ebi.mdk.domain.entity.AnnotatedEntity)

getCrossReference

public <I extends Identifier> CrossReference<I,Observation> getCrossReference(I identifier)
Builds a cross-reference from the identifier. The cross-reference is designated either a ChEBICrossReference, KEGGCompoundIdentifier, EnzymeClassification or Classification. If no appropiate cross-reference is available then the default CrossReference class is return

Specified by:
getCrossReference in interface AnnotationFactory
Parameters:
identifier -
Returns:

getSubclasses

public Collection<Class<? extends Annotation>> getSubclasses(Class<? extends Annotation> c)
Description copied from interface: AnnotationFactory
Access a collection of all known sub-classes of the annotation. e.g. providing CrossReference should return KEGGCompoundCrossReference, ChEBICrossReference, EnzymeClassification etc..

Specified by:
getSubclasses in interface AnnotationFactory
Parameters:
c - super-class
Returns:
all known sub-classes and the provided class
